content: Oct 31 Under Armour Inc's third-quarter profit more than halved from a year ago  hit by an $85 million restructuring charge.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Under Armour profit hit by restructuring charge

content: Oct 31 Under Armour Inc slashed 2017 forecasts and reported its first quarterly fall in revenue since going public on Tuesday  as the sportswear firm struggled to make inroads against global rivals Nike and Adidas .
name: Under Armour Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Under Armour chops forecasts as North America slide worsens

content: Under Armour Inc  co-founder Kip Fulks is taking a sabbatical from the sportswear maker  the company told Reuters on Monday.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Under Armour says co-founder Kip Fulks taking sabbatical

content: Oct 23 Under Armour Inc co-founder Kip Fulks is taking a sabbatical from the sportswear maker  the company told Reuters on Monday.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Under Armour says co-founder Kip Fulks taking sabbatical

content: Oct 23 Under Armour Inc is mulling exit from its smaller sports categories to combat slowing industry sales and co-founder Kip Fulks is taking a sabbatical  Wall Street Journal reported on Monday  citing people familiar with the matter.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Under Armour may exit some categories  co-founder takes sabbatical - WSJ

content: Shares of Under Armour Inc  sank more than 3 percent on Tuesday  a day after National Basketball Association star Kevin Durant said young players do not like the company's shoes.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: NBA star Durant takes shot at Under Armour  stock falls

content: The chief executives of Intel Corp  Merck & Co Inc and Under Armour Inc resigned from U.S. President Donald Trump's American Manufacturing Council on Monday  following Trump's initially tepid response to weekend violence at a rally of white supremacists in Charlottesville  Virginia. | Video
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Three CEOs resign from Trump council over Charlottesville

content: Aug 14 The chief executives of Intel Corp   Merck & Co Inc and Under Armour Inc resigned from U.S. President Donald Trump's American Manufacturing Council on Monday  following Trump's initially tepid response to weekend violence at a rally of white supremacists in Charlottesville  Virginia.

content: Under Armour Inc   which became a sensation riding the athleisure trend a few years ago  laid out a strategy this week to stanch a steep decline in sales growth but the company's progress could hit roadblocks.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Under Armour's game plan to revive sales could hit snags

content: Under Armour Inc's  shares slumped to a record-low after the company trimmed its sales forecast and said it would cut jobs and close stores  underscoring the company's struggles in a fast-changing and fiercely competitive U.S. sportswear market.

title: Under Armour shares hit record low after forecast cut

title: Under Armour's smaller-than-expected loss eases investor fears

content: NEW YORK Shares of sports apparel and shoe maker Under Armour Inc  could rise 30 percent and the company is likely to increase sales at a double-digit clip for years to come as it has several markets left to tap fully  Barron's said in a report on Sunday.

title: Under Armour stock could rise more than 30 percent in a year: Barron's

content: Sportswear maker Under Armour Inc   forecast 2017 sales well below analysts' estimates  a sign that the company is finding it tough to replicate the rapid growth it achieved since going public in 2005 as competition intensifies. | Video
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Under Armour's rapid growth hits speed bump  shares skid

content: NEW YORK (Reuters Breakingviews) - Under Armour's founder-led approach is wearing thin. The $12 billion athletic-wear maker reported its slowest top-line growth in eight years and signaled more challenges ahead. Its chief financial officer is also bailing. The news wiped a quarter off the company's market value. Chief Executive Kevin Plank's strategy of maintaining power is underperforming badly.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Under Armour's founder-led approach wears thin

content: * Class A shares down 26 pct  Class C shares fall 28 pct   (Adds Breakingviews link)
name: Under Armour Inc
title: UPDATE 4-Under Armour's rapid growth hits speed bump  shares skid

content: Under Armour Inc's   revenue increased at breakneck speed for more than six years  averaging a quarterly growth rate of 20 percent  as shoppers couldn't get enough of their Stephen Curry basketball gear and Bandit running shoes.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Under Armour's slower revenue growth seen as new normal

content: Jan 31 Sportswear maker Under Armour Inc   said its Chief Financial Officer Chip Molloy would step down and reported lower-than-expected quarterly sales  hurt by intense competition and slowing growth in North America.
name: Under Armour Inc
title: Under Armour posts sales miss; CFO to resign
